revised_title: Anatomy and Reproduction in Cordylophora: Insights into Tubularian Zoophytes
tldr: The author examines the anatomy and reproductive system of Cordylophora, a type of zoophyte, and discovers similarities to the reproductive systems of other hydroid species. He also describes the development of the embryo from the ovum to a free-swimming ciliated animacule and its progression into the adult zoophyte.
